basic_node.title: Small area of primary receiver optics
basic_node.description: Limited field of view of primary receiver optics, determined by size of beam-receiving lens.
basic_node.references: [re1, http://link.springer.com/10.1007/0-387-25101-4_4, Lidar Equation: System factor K: Area of primary receiver optics A; p.6-7.] [re1, https://ieeexplore.ieee.org/document/8500511/, Laser-Radar-Equation: Receiving lens surface A_sensor.]
